citations.narrative:
A new Institutional Official (IO) was appointed at the facility since June 2015. The USDA-AC Regional Director
(eastern region) has not yet been notified of this change. To ensure significant changes are communicated to the
regional office in a timely manner, the USDA must be notified by certified mail within 10 days of all changes which
affect facility operations.
Correct by: August 21, 2015
Exit interview conducted with a facility representative.

narrative:
2.30(c)(1)
REGISTRATION.
A new Institutional Official (IO) was appointed at the facility since June 2015.  The USDA-AC Regional Director
(eastern region) has not yet been notified of this change.  To ensure significant changes are communicated to the
regional office in a timely manner, the USDA must be notified by certified mail within 10 days of all changes which
affect facility operations.
Correct by: August 21, 2015
Exit interview conducted with a facility representative.
